website_summaries.verdict: Food and drug administration approved and designed to improve abdominal tone and exercise all the muscles in your core.
pros: Total abdominal workout with comfortable gel pads
The belt sends a signal to make your abdominal muscles tighten and relax
Both upper and lower abs are engaged, providing optimal results in a short period of time
cons: Did not work for some people

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sonobello surgical procedure cuz u actually get definition
customer_reviews.text: 8 years ago I got one of the very first models and fell in love with it. It did its job. I moved recently And found it while I was unpacking. And it still worked, just needed new gel pads. Cuz once the stickiness is gone three machine cannot adhere well to make the pulses to contract your ab muscles. But that one only has 4 settings. I wanted a newer and advanced same Slendertone so for under a 100$ I feel like I got a steal 😁 10 settings and omgosh my abs hurt the very next day after my initial use. I love my new ab toy!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEE NEAL

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It helps keep my stomach flat. I have given these as gifts. I highly recommend for people who don’t really dig exercise. I can lie on the couch, eating chocolate while working my abs... perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me!
customer_reviews.text: This device is helping me recover abdominal muscle tone lost after gallbladder surgery 2 years ago-- something I was unable to accomplish with exercise alone. I'm talking here about the deep muscles that hold everything in. I had no expectation that it would deliver a "six pack", as I'll be content with a sturdy and functional "keg".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to lose belly after giving birth! The effect of hard exercise is still not ideal! Fortunately, with it! Help me a lot! Very convenient to use and convenient to carry! The first thing I get up every day is to use it! 40 minutes a day! When you are using it! You can do all other things! It's really convenient! It's a lot easier than sports! I really love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: YJG

customer_reviews.title: I was super OCD about making sure that I applied the sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: I was super OCD about making sure that I applied the sticky pads on the correct way the first time I used it, going overly out of my way to maintain the integrity of the adhesive. The slender tone worked about four times/ workouts. Then kept reading error for both left and right sides. I tried adjusting the pads...no dice. Super disappointed. I had heard a lot of good things about Slendertone and was totally let down. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Peytuniaa

customer_reviews.title: BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP BEEP
customer_reviews.text: I used it once without any hiccups... The second time I used it it did nothing but beep at me for trying to get the settings where I need it to go. Then it bugs out on me. I would love to post a video on how ridiculous it's being. The pads are clean, there's great contact between pads and skin and still beeps like a damn broken robot. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne V

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work. I called the company to tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work. I called the company to tell them that the middle didn't work, they said I had to turn it up higher. I did but it still didn't work. Returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this product and it works..I noticed a difference after two weeks of daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: mati

customer_reviews.title: I've used it regularly to enhance my workouts and I love the positive comments I get on how ripped my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a year after I had my baby, and it works amazingly well! I can actually see the muscles contracting and feel the 'burn'. I've used it regularly to enhance my workouts and I love the positive comments I get on how ripped my abs look!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what they were thinking. My waste size is a 38. So I'm a little chunky monkey but my other Slendor Tone belt fit. But it wore out so I bought another and this one wouldn't fir around a 32 inch waste. WTF
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months
customer_reviews.text: do not buy. I wish I could return but it's right outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Really makes you feel you are using the right product to get abs!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: It's a waste of money if the pads do not protect you ...
customer_reviews.text: The belt did work but when I was ready to up the settings the pads did not protect. I sent it back. It's a waste of money if the pads do not protect you from being zapped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just flat out works when you cant work those muscles out.
customer_reviews.author: swain

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! My fiancé and I can definitely feel it working!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ... for the belt so bigger people can use it easily.
customer_reviews.text: Should have extensions for the belt so bigger people can use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sljack0105

customer_reviews.title: HUGE waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. HUGE waste of money. Tingles and contracts your muscles, felt no soreness from it, used it for 6 weeks (while maintaining proper diet) and saw no results. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allysoncraig

customer_reviews.title: it would be nice to be able to return it for a
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't work. it would be nice to be able to return it for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: it was alright. definently not as expected. you can feel it working but you definently need a 6 pack in order to see any chanfges in slender or toneing
customer_reviews.author: fire guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome, works really good, and you can really feel it
customer_reviews.author: Silvia H.

customer_reviews.title: A bodybuilding must!
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifter for 8 years now. This Product does things that no weight can. My abs get such a good workout now, that I have no need to work them in the gym! Also it seems to promote growth all over. Maybe I'm not supposed to mention this, but I used this on my arms too and WOW! It caused some kind of total growth of my entire bicep and triceps! Everyone who wants to look good should have one of these. I am a cheap person, who budget shops as much as possible and Amazon was so right on with their pricing. So nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mr E

customer_reviews.title: Bad piece of equiptment
customer_reviews.text: this product is garbage. i got it the other day and it is giving me all kinds of problems. ii called the manufacturer and they said replace the battery's and that should do the trick. Well it did not. i called them back and the would not replace it because i purchased it from amazon. i am out 120 dollars. don't buy it. JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Schopf

customer_reviews.title: error e2 DOES NOT WORK & customer support HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this belt from costco, i used a few times, after my pregnancy.. oops.. error e2, changed the batteries and nothing. i conctacted the customer service, they asked for the serial #, gave it. and then blocked my email address !!!! just i was asking for a repair center !!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY IT. THERE IS A VERY COMMON ERROR E2 WITH NO SOLUTION! the service is the worse in the world !!!!!!!! NOW I HAVE A PIECE OF GARBAGE !
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Service Is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Did a chat to troubleshoot the constant beeping issue. WOW what a run around. Like IT support for dummies 2.0. Are the gel pads on correctly, are the contacts clean, batteries. So after all of that, 20 minutes of back and forth, i have to call them to go over everything I just explained on chat because they have to have the call recorded to open a trouble ticket. PISS POOR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DEEZREVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Helps alot with effort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and was very sceptical. I'm pleasantly surprised. While this will not give you ripped abs on its own, it definitely strengthens your core. My regular ab routine has become easier and I can achieve more of a workout using this product. However the belt is a bit on the small side. I did not pay this high price for it. You can find it cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got mines from Amazon but I’ve had it for years and it still works good. I saw results after a week but I workout with it on. I like the different settings. Only issue I had and I stopped using it for a while, it kept giving me beeping error. I think I needed new gel pads because I started using it again and it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: works pretty well... been using for 3 weeks straight definitely feel more toned and firmer abs. Of course this does not replace a work out and eating right!
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to use - love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have been using it every day while I cook dinner for the past few weeks as it is super simple to just put on get on with my daily life. I have seen results after only a few weeks so I am excited to keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to lose weight
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for what it's designed for. That is to say that it is not some sort of weight loss miracle, but is a good unit for putting your core muscles through some daily exercise. The only downside is the pads tend to burn out pretty quick. Even the batteries last longer, but that aside a very good unit overall.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Abdominal Toning Belt
customer_reviews.text: A product is only as good as it's instruction booklet. Works fine, but not as stated in ads or on box. It is supposed to automatically jump from program to program increasing the power as it goes. It dosen't. The power must be reset each time it's turned on. The book dosen't say how to get it to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Stu's Choice

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplemental Deivce
customer_reviews.text: You are not going to get ripped with this, but as a way to get more abs time in it is great. You still have to do situps just not as many. This device will tone and strength your abs as you watch TV or at work while you are sitting at a desk. I recommend you get to full strength as fast as possible and do multiple time intervals before removal. This will increase pad life.
customer_reviews.author: T. Long

customer_reviews.title: If the pads were lasting longer ....
customer_reviews.text: If the pads were lasting longer the Slendertone Flex Pro would be a great little belt to assure you do get a great ABS workout! Unfortunatly the pads just last about 10 to 15 uses, no too long as you see!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Grieb

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how all different types of slendertones are different from each other. All I know is, what I bought is working.
customer_reviews.author: Gi J. Park

product_meta.title: Slendertone Abs5 Abdominal Muscle Toner
product_meta.description:
The Slendertone Abs5 Abdominal Toning Belt uses clinically proven EMS technology to tone and firm the abs with results you can see and feel in 6-8 weeks. EMS stimulates the nerves that control all of the major abdominal muscles causing them to contract and relax. The result of this repetitive action is tighter, firmer and more toned abs. Automatically advances you through programs 1-10. Electronic built-in controller with LCD audio and visual display. Adjustable Intensity levels from 0-130 for beginners to athletes.

Unisex Belt fits waist sizes 24”-46”.

Includes: Abdominal Muscle Toner Belt, LCD Control Unit, Travel Pouch, 3-AAA batteries, 3 adhesive Gel Pads, User Manual, Quick Start Guide and 2-Year Limited Warranty.

FDA Indications for Use: Slendertone is indicated for the improvement of abdominal muscle tone, for strengthening of abdominal muscles and for the development of a firmer abdomen. FDA 510(k) Clearance #100556

Slendertone is not a weight loss or fat reduction product. We recommend using Slendertone along with a healthy diet and regular exercise.



AMAZON.COM
The perfect abdominal contraction. From the leader in at home muscle toning, the Slendertone Abs5 abdominal muscle toner is a powerful, proven system that uses electrical muscle stimulation (EMS) technology to tone, firm and strengthen the abdominal muscles. Slendertone stimulates the nerves that control all of the major abdominal muscles causing them to contract and relax similar to regular exercise. The result of this repetitive action is tighter, firmer and more toned abs. An advanced training system for beginners to fitness enthusiasts with 10 auto-progressive toning programs and up to 130 customizable intensity levels for an effective and comfortable workout session. Clinically demonstrated technology to exercise all of the muscles of the abdomen at once (upper ABS, lower ABS and obliques) the patented 3 pad placement technology targets all of the abdominal muscles simultaneously. Includes: Abs5 belt, controller, AC charger, travel storage pouch, 3 medical-grade adhesive gel pads, 3 AAA batteries, quick start guide and 2 year limited warranty. Fits waist sizes 24 to 46 inches. For best results, combine Slendertone Abs5 workout sessions with a healthy diet and regular exercise
feature_bullets: Tone the muscles, firm the abs
A Complete workout for all the ab muscles
Used world-wide by physical therapists and sports professionals to strengthen and tone all core abdominal muscles
FDA cleared to tone, firm and strengthen the abdominal muscles
Designed for both men and women
